title: Fate Of Decades-Old Cigar Factory Dangles By A Phrase
teaser: Florida once had 150 cigar factories but now there's just one left. The J.C. Newman company worries that new FDA rules on cigars may put it out of business. Now, it's enlisting the help of elected officials in Florida.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
